title: Three-star Bermuda hotel is Expedia’s top-rated, best value stay
text:
Three-star Bermuda hotel is Expedia’s top-rated, best value stay Thursday July 16, 2015 Print Article Royal Palms Hotel, Bermuda. — AFP/Relaxnews pic 
Of the 650 properties considered, the Royal Palms Hotel in Bermuda tops the list with 126 verified guests giving the property a 4.9 out of 5 note. One hundred per cent of guests also recommended the property to fellow travellers praising the bed and breakfast-style boutique hotel for its old world charm, friendly service and immaculate rooms. 
In addition to guest satisfaction, winning hotels are those that consistently deliver value for money with competitive pricing, pristine amenities and superior customer service, says Expedia. 
One hundred per cent of guests also recommended the property to fellow travellers praising the bed and breakfast-style boutique hotel for its old world charm, friendly service and immaculate rooms. — AFP/Relaxnews pic Meanwhile, the Royal Palms is the first to point out that their suites are not dripping in gold and crystals, and advise potential guests that awards and accolades — they’ve also topped ‘best of’ lists on Fodor’s and TripAdvisor — are based on guest satisfaction and not its opulence. 
“...we feel it would be useful to remember that awards are largely based on guest satisfaction which is closely tied to relative value for money and not simply on how ‘ritzy’ a hotel is,” reads an excerpt from their website. 
Royal Palms Hotel, Bermuda. — AFP/Relaxnews pic Located near Hamilton, the property consists of two, flamingo pink 19th-century manor houses that reflect Colonial and Bermudian architecture. 
Here are the top 10 hotels on Expedia’s 2015 Insiders’ Select list: 
1. Royal Palms Hotel, Bermuda 
2. Celenga Apartments, Dubrovnik, Croatia 
3. Pumilio Mountain & Ocean Hotel, Jaco, Costa Rica 
4. Woolleys Classic Suites, Denver, Colorado, USA 
5. Dormy Inn Sapporo Annex, Japan 
6. B+B Edinburgh, Scotland 
7. Hotel Panorama, Maiori, Amalfi Coast, Italy 
8. Santhiya Koh Phangan Resort & Spa, Koh Phangan, Thailand 
9. Hotel Orion Motobu Resort & Spa, Okinawa Island, Japan
